                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>

        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. </div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Contribution arrangement for January 2025 (20 January 2025)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Lunar New Year holiday is around the corner. Employers are reminded to submit MPF Remittance Statements and make contributions in advance before the contribution deadline. </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For employers who submit Remittance Statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure your mail items bear sufficient postage before posting and allow sufficient time for delivery to ensure the Remittance Statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline. Employers can also submit e-Remittance Statements and employer contributions via HSBC HK Business Express mobile app​ (applicable to HSBC commercial banking customers only) or HSBC Business Internet Banking anytime, anywhere. <a href="/mpf/existing-employer-customers/eservices/" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            The latest edition of the "HSBC Retirement Monitor" is published (11 December 2024)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_7" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The latest edition of "HSBC Retirement Monitor* (December 2024)" is now available on HSBC MPF website. You can click <a href="/mpf/retirement-monitor/" target="_self">here</a> to understand the estimated expenditure for living in Hong Kong after retirement.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">*The "HSBC Retirement Monitor" was commissioned by HSBC MPF with The Association of Superannuation Funds of Australia conducting the research and analysis.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_4">

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Notice of HSBC MPF Online and Mobile Banking Terms (2 December 2024)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We would like to notify you that starting from 12 January 2025, you will be asked to accept the HSBC MPF Online and Mobile Banking Terms before you access the HSBC MPF services under the Personal Internet Banking. This is a one-time requirement which will be implemented in phases for all Personal Internet Banking users with MPF accounts. Please read the related <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/pib-notice-20241202.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice  This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_5">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

You can click <a href="/mpf/retirement-monitor/" target="_self">here</a> to understand the estimated expenditure for living in Hong Kong after retirement.<br> <br> *The "HSBC Retirement Monitor" was commissioned by HSBC MPF with The Association of Superannuation Funds of Australia conducting the research and analysis.</p>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_6" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="suspension-of-tuen-mun-town-plaza-branch-weekend-roadshow"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Suspension of Tuen Mun Town Plaza Branch weekend roadshow on 10-11 August 2024 (9 August 2024)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC MPF weekend roadshow in Tuen Mun Town Plaza Branch on 10-11 August 2024 is suspended until further notice. We are sorry for the inconvenience and will provide updates on the weekend roadshow schedule as the situation evolves.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Find out more about MPF and understand what are the considerations when choosing an MPF scheme, visit and meet our MPF Specialists at designated branches with MPF service during branch business hour or <a href="https://appointment.hsbc.com.hk/pensions/?config.bbLocaleSettings.defaultLanguage=en" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">making an appointment</span><span class="visuallyhidden">making an appointment  This link will open in a new window</span></a> to meet them with selected timeslot.</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_7" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="cdsb-hmpf"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Changes in the disclosures in the MPF Scheme Brochure of the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (22 July 2024)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_11" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With effect from 12 August 2024, the disclosures of certain Constituent Funds in the MPF Scheme Brochure of the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus will be updated with respect to the use of financial futures contracts by its respective underlying approved pooled investment funds (the ‘APIFs’). The changes will allow the Investment Manager of the underlying APIFs to have the flexibility to address any settlement mismatch and will not have any adverse impact to scheme participants.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For further details of the above changes, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-20240722.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a> and <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs//mpf/faq-202407.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">frequently asked questions</span><span class="visuallyhidden">frequently asked questions  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The First Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure of the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus will be issued on 12 August 2024 and be available on the HSBC MPF website in due course.</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_8" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="iksid"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            An interactive key scheme information document of HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘SuperTrust Plus’) has been launched (28 June 2024)
    </h3>

        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A key scheme information document (KSID) webpage offering an interactive experience has been launched to help scheme participants easily access key information about the SuperTrust Plus such as relevant fees and charges payable and the constituent funds available.<br> <br> Enjoy the new experience with a simple <a href="/mpf/key-scheme-information-document/" target="_self">click</a>. Scheme participants can now view the SuperTrust Plus’s updated fund information sorted by fund category, read the SuperTrust Plus scheme document to learn more about the scheme, download commonly used administration forms to manage their MPF accounts, and conveniently access and navigate the MPFA website.<br> <br> Learn how our award-winning products and services can help scheme participants save towards their retirement now.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Guaranteed Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Fund available under HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is 0.20% per annum in the financial year from 1 July 2024 to 30 June 2025. The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions.     <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Update of risk rating of Constituent Funds under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the “Scheme”) (3 June 2024)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_17" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We conduct reviews of the risk ratings for the Constituent Funds under the Scheme regularly in response to market conditions and our internal evaluations. Starting from 13 November 2023, we implemented a revised methodology that resulted in revisions to the risk ratings of certain Constituent Funds. On the other hand, the calculation methodology for risk class, which is another set of risk indicator concurrently being disclosed with the risk rating in the Fund Fact Sheet, remains unchanged.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To obtain the latest risk ratings of the Constituent Funds and the description of each of the risk rating category, please refer to the Monthly Fund Performance Summary and/or the Fund Fact Sheet posted on the HSBC MPF website or to the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Should you have any queries, please contact our HSBC MPF Member Hotline on <a href="tel:85231280128" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3128 0128</a>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that the risk ratings provided are for reference only and should not be regarded as investment advice. You should not solely rely on the risk ratings when making any investment choices for your MPF account(s).</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Entering its 10th anniversary this year, the Good MPF Employer Award is now open for applications and nominations. Employers who are exemplary in enhancing the retirement benefits of their employees should act now and receive the recognition you deserve!</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For details and online application, please visit <a href="https://www.mpfa.org.hk/en/mpfa/corporate-events/good-mpf-employer-award" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">The Good MPF Employer Award website</span><span class="visuallyhidden">The Good MPF Employer Award website  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The deadline is 15 July 2024.</p>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Guaranteed Interest Rate for the new financial year (30 June 2023)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_34" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Guaranteed Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Fund available under HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is 0.15% per annum in the financial year from 1 July 2023 to 30 June 2024. The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) 'Guarantee features' of the <u><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a></u> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the 'Guarantee Conditions'.</p>
</div></div>

    </div>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The latest edition of "HSBC Retirement Monitor*(June 2023)" is now available on HSBC MPF website. You can click <a href="/mpf/retirement-monitor/">here</a> to understand the estimated expenditure for living in Hong Kong after retirement.</p>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Contribution arrangement for March 2023 (27 March 2023)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_41" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Ching Ming Festival and Easter holiday are around the corner. Employers are reminded to submit MPF Remittance Statements and make contributions in advance before the contribution deadline. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For employers who submit Remittance Statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure your mail items bear sufficient postage before posting and allow sufficient time for delivery to ensure the Remittance Statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline. Employers can also submit e-Remittance Statements and employer contributions via HSBC HK Business Express mobile app (applicable to HSBC commercial banking customers only) or HSBC Business Internet Banking anytime, anywhere. <a href="/mpf/understanding/managing/#employer" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Update of risk rating for the Hong Kong and Chinese Equity Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the “Scheme”) (27 February 2023)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_43" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We conduct reviews of the risk ratings for the Constituent Funds under the Scheme regularly and the risk ratings may be subject to change from time to time. We would like to inform you that the latest risk rating review has been completed. <strong>With effect from 28 February 2023, the risk rating for the Hong Kong and Chinese Equity Fund under the Scheme will be increased from '4' to '5</strong>, while the risk ratings for other Constituent Funds under the Scheme remain unchanged.<br> <br> To obtain the latest risk ratings of the other Constituent Funds and the description of each of the risk rating category, please refer to the 'Monthly Fund Performance Summary' and/or the 'Fund Fact Sheet' posted on the HSBC MPF website or to the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Should you have any queries, please contact our HSBC MPF Member Hotline on <strong><a href="tel:+852-3128-0128" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3128 0128</a></strong>.<br> <br> Please note that the risk ratings provided are for reference only and should not be regarded as investment advice. You should not rely on the risk ratings when making any investment choices for your MPF account(s).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
</div></div>

    </div>
</div></div>

    <div class="anchor" id="16Nov2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Changes in relation to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘Scheme’) (16 November 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_48" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As announced earlier, from 13 September 2022, several changes in relation to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund (the ‘Constituent Fund’) of the Scheme have taken effect. The Constituent Fund’s underlying ITCIS (i.e. Hang Seng Index ETF) has been de-listed from the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited and continues to operate as an unlisted fund. Consequentially, the Hang Seng Index ETF has been renamed to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund. The management fee of the Constituent Fund has been updated from ‘up to 0.755%’ to ‘up to 0.73%’ pa of NAV. For further details, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-20221025.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a>, <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/supplement-20221116.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a> and <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/ksid.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Key Scheme Information Document</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Key Scheme Information Document  This link will open in a new window</span></a> of the Scheme which have already available on HSBC MPF website.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_35">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="25Oct2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Changes in relation to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘Scheme’) (25 October 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_49" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Informed by Hang Seng Investment Management Limited, who is the Investment Manager for the underlying ITCIS (i.e. Hang Seng Index ETF) invested by the Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund of the Scheme (the ‘Constituent Fund’), that the Hang Seng Index ETF is de-listed from the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited on 13 September 2022 and continues to operate as an unlisted fund. Consequentially, Hang Seng Index ETF is renamed to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund. Such changes do not result in any change in the underlying ITCIS’s investment objective as disclosed in the MPF Scheme Brochure (which is to track the Hang Seng Index), its key operators (including the Investment Manager) and the manner in which it is managed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In addition, the management fee of the Constituent Fund is updated from ‘up to 0.755%’ to ‘up to 0.73%’ pa of NAV with effective from 13 September 2022.  </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For further details of the above, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-20221025.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The MPF Scheme Brochure as amended by the Supplement reflecting the above changes and the updated Key Scheme Information Document will be available on or after 13 September 2022 on HSBC MPF website.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_39">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="30June2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Key Scheme Information Document of HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘SuperTrust Plus’) will be available on 30 June 2022 (30 June 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_56" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Key Scheme Information Document (the ‘KSID’), which forms part of the offering document of the SuperTrust Plus, will be available from 30 June 2022. The KSID helps to provide scheme members with key scheme information relating to the SuperTrust Plus in a simplified and standardized format prescribed by the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority. The KSID has adopted a layered approach which scheme members will benefit from having one single document that bring them to more information and can choose the level of detail of information desired. The KSID is designed to be easy-to-read to directing scheme members to the necessary documents or tools through electronic means (e.g. web link and/or QR code provided).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/ksid/202206.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">KSID</span><span class="visuallyhidden">KSID  This link will open in a new window</span></a> (together with the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure/202112.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a>) and <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/ksid-notice.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a> are available on HSBC MPF website. For further information, please feel free to contact the HSBC MPF Employer Hotline +852 2583 8033 or HSBC MPF Member Hotline +852 3128 0128.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_40">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="30june2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Guaranteed Interest Rate for the new financial year (30 June 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_57" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Guaranteed Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Fund available under HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is 0.15% per annum in the financial year from 1 July 2022 to 30 June 2023. The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) 'Guarantee features' of the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure/202112.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the 'Guarantee Conditions'.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_41">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="1June2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            The latest edition of the "HSBC Retirement Monitor" is published (1 June 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_58" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The latest edition of "HSBC Retirement Monitor* (June 2022) " is now available on HSBC MPF website. You can click <a href="/mpf/retirement-monitor/">here</a> to understand the estimated expenditure for living in Hong Kong after retirement. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">*The "HSBC Retirement Monitor" was commissioned by HSBC MPF with The Association of Superannuation Funds of Australia conducting the research and analysis.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_42">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="29April2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Contribution arrangement for April 2022 (29 April 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_59" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Public holidays of May (Day following of Labour Day and Buddha’s birthday) are coming soon. Employers are reminded to submit remittance statement and make contribution payment earlier to avoid missing the contribution deadline. For employers who submit remittance statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure there is sufficient time for ensure the remittance statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_43">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="22April2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Good MPF Employer Award 2021-22 accepts applications till 30 June (22 April 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_60" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The 2021-22 Good MPF Employer Award (the Award), organized by the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority (MPFA), is now open for applications and nominations. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Award aims to promote and foster employer compliance with MPF legislation; encourage employers to provide better retirement benefits for their employees; and recognise employers who are exemplary in enhancing the retirement benefits of their employees. Nearly 2,500 companies and organizations have been honoured as “Good MPF Employers” since its debut in 2015. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Eligible employers should act now and apply for the Award. Employees are also welcome to nominate their employers for the Award. For more details, please visit the <a href="https://www.mpfa.org.hk/en/mpfa/corporate-events/good-mpf-employer-award" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Good MPF Employer Award website</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Good MPF Employer Award website  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The deadline is 30 June 2022. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The above information is provided by the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_44" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="1April2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            HSBC MPF has been awarded the “Employers’ Choice Award” (1 April 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_61" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Further to the achievements of 7 MPF Ratings’ awards earlier in January, we are excited to announce that HSBC MPF has been crowned the title of “Employers’ Choice” at “The 2022 MPF Awards” by MPF Ratings. It is the first time we have won this prestigious industry award with the support of Hong Kong employers who voted HSBC MPF as the most popular MPF scheme in Hong Kong. For more details on the “Employers’ Choice Award”, please refer <a href="https://mpfratings.com.hk/2022/03/08/hsbc-is-mpfs-employers-choice/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">here</span><span class="visuallyhidden">here  This link will open in a new window</span></a> for the media release issued by MPF Ratings.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">8 MPF Ratings’ awards<sup>1</sup> won by HSBC MPF include:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Employers’ Choice</li> 
 <li>Gold Rated Scheme</li> 
 <li>5 Year Gold Scheme (It is the six consecutive year HSBC MPF received the gold rating)</li> 
 <li>Best Use of Technology</li> 
 <li>Environmentally Responsible</li> 
 <li>Good Governance*</li> 
 <li>5 Years Consistent Performer – Bond (Global)</li> 
 <li>10 Years Consistent Performer – Bond (Global)</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">* ‘Good Governance’ was awarded to the HSBC Provident Fund Trustee (Hong Kong) Limited as the Trustee for HSBC MPF – SuperTrust Plus.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Source:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>MPF Ratings. The awards and rating were based on MPF Ratings’ assessment criteria. For the awardee, assessment and rating criteria/methodology, please refer to <a href="https://mpfratings.com.hk/ratings-and-awards/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://mpfratings.com.hk/ratings-and-awards/</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://mpfratings.com.hk/ratings-and-awards/  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Note:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Investment involves risks. Past performance is not indicative of future performance. The value of financial instruments, in particular stocks and shares, and any income from such financial instrument, may go down as well as up. For further details including the product features and risks involved, please refer to the MPF Scheme Brochure.</li> 
 <li>The content shared in this article should not be viewed as investment recommendation and advice. You should seek professional analysis and advice before making any decisions related to the information shared in this article.</li> 
 <li>The above awards are for reference only and this material is for corporate news update purpose only. They are not indicative of the actual or future performance of the constituent funds.</li> 
 <li>Through this material you are given the relevant award websites which are not under our control.  We have no control over the nature, content and availability of those sites.  </li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Easter holiday is around the corner. Employers are reminded to submit MPF Remittance Statements and make contributions in advance before the contribution deadline.  </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For employers who submit Remittance Statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure your mail items bear sufficient postage before posting and allow sufficient time for delivery to ensure the Remittance Statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline. Employers can also submit e-Remittance Statements and employer contributions via HSBC HK Business Express mobile app (applicable to HSBC commercial banking customers only) or HSBC Business Internet Banking anytime, anywhere. <a href="/mpf/understanding/managing/#employer">Learn more</a>.</p>

    </h3>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_64" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Cast your vote for your favourite MPF Scheme at MPF Ratings’ People’s Choice Award! The result of the poll contributes to the selection of the winner of the 4th annual People’s Choice Award, which is one of the prestigious awards held by MPF Ratings. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR22R-RW-ALL"><strong>Please visit the below webpage to cast your vote on or before 14 February 2022</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR22R-RW-ALL"><a href="https://mpfratings.com.hk/2022-peoples-choice-vote/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://mpfratings.com.hk/2022-peoples-choice-vote/</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://mpfratings.com.hk/2022-peoples-choice-vote/  This link will open in a new window</span></a><strong><u></u></strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(You will not be requested to provide your HSBC log-in credentials to take part in the survey)</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For more details of the award, please visit MPF Ratings’ website, <a href="https://mpfratings.com.hk/ratings-and-awards/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://mpfratings.com.hk/ratings-and-awards/</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://mpfratings.com.hk/ratings-and-awards/  This link will open in a new window</span></a><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Note:</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that the poll webpage is not hosted by us. MPF Ratings (an independent provider of MPF research, views and opinions and the organiser of the “People’s Choice” award) is not the supplier appointed by HSBC regarding the poll. Your contact information will be collected from the poll which is not intended for distribution to, or use by HSBC. The information will be used by MPF Ratings for verification to avoid duplicate voting and for communication on the incentive gift for joining the poll. The information will be destroyed after the completion and verification of the poll result and after the incentive gift is communicated to the participants. For any queries on the handling of the data concerned, please call the MPF Ratings at (852) 2588 3409.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Disclaimers:</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This document does not constitute an invitation, inducement or advice to you on any products or services. Please seek professional advice where necessary. HSBC is not responsible for any content on third party sites, nor does a link suggest endorsement of those sites and/or their content.</p>
</div></div>

</div></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">

    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_68" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_51">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="6Dec2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            A Milestone Accomplished to HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (6 December 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_69" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC MPF helps scheme participants to accumulate wealth to reach their retirement goals. We are committed to building long-term relationship with our customers and enhancing our products and services. HSBC MPF has completed the fund re-structuring announced in July 2021. Our HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus now consists of Constituent Funds covering all the fund types inclusive of money market fund, bond fund, mixed assets fund, guaranteed fund and equity fund, whilst both actively managed and passive/index-tracking equity funds are also offered for the major geographical regions inclusive of Hong Kong, mainland China, Asia, Europe and North America. Scheme participants can better differentiate each of the Constituent Funds under our platform and make the investment choices meeting their own investment styles, risk tolerance levels and personal circumstances.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Managing your MPF account(s) is at your fingertips. You can view your MPF balance, review best performing funds and change your investment allocation through internet banking or HSBC HK Mobile Banking app anytime and anywhere.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_52">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="30Nov2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Update of risk rating for the Hong Kong and Chinese Equity Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus (the "Scheme") (30 November 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_70" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We regularly conduct reviews of the risk ratings for the constituent funds under the Scheme, and are pleased to inform you that the latest risk rating review has been completed. <strong>With effect from 1 December 2021, the risk rating for the Hong Kong and Chinese Equity Fund under the Scheme will be decreased from '5' to '4'</strong>, while the risk ratings for other constituent funds under the Scheme remain unchanged. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To obtain the risk ratings of the other constituent funds and the description of each of the risk rating category, please refer to the HSBC MPF website, the 'Monthly Fund Performance Summary' and/or the 'Fund Fact Sheet'. Should you have any queries, please contact our HSBC MPF Member Hotline on <a href="tel:+85231280128" class="no-link" role="presentation"><strong>(852) 3128 0128</strong></a>. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that the risk ratings are provided for reference only and should not be regarded as investment advice.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Operation hours: Sat: 3-8pm & Sun: 10-8pm</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We will provide MPF services including services related to MPF Tax Deductible Voluntary Contribution (TVC), Account consolidation, Fund performance update and MPF retirement planning etc. during the special operation hours indicated above at these designated branches.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Find out more about MPF, and understand what are the considerations when choosing an MPF scheme. Please contact our MPF Specialist by approaching the above designated branches on specific day or <a href="https://appointment.hsbc.com.hk/pensions/?config.bbLocaleSettings.defaultLanguage=en" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">making an appointment</span><span class="visuallyhidden">making an appointment  This link will open in a new window</span></a> to meet them with selected timeslot.</p>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_55">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="6July2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Update on various changes to the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus (the ‘SuperTrust Plus’) (6 July 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_74" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC MPF always strive to deliver high level of MPF products and services at all times. We are pleased to announce that several changes will be effected with the effective dates set out as below: </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>VC Equity Fund Restructuring: restructure 3 of our existing funds (collectively the ‘VC Equity Funds’) into index-tracking funds;</li> 
 <li>VC Balanced Fund Change: restructure the ValueChoice Balanced Fund such that its underlying investments will be predominantly passively managed; </li> 
 <li>De-layering: simplify the investment structure of the equity funds (collectively the ‘Equity Funds’);</li> 
 <li>Name Change: change the names of the affected Constituent Funds, where applicable</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM M-BSCTBL-RW-RBWM" role="region"><div data-accessibility-tick-icon-text="available" data-accessibility-cross-icon-text="not available" id="content_main_basicTable_12" class="table-wrapper

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_75" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With the above changes, the SuperTrust Plus will consist of a more comprehensive offering of Constituent Funds, with a suite of low-fee funds that are index-tracking or passively managed. We believe this can facilitate you to better differentiate the restructured funds from other active funds on our MPF platform, allowing you to make investment choices meeting your own investment styles, risk tolerance levels and personal circumstances. This, together with the de-layering change, can simplify the investment structure of the funds and enhance investment, administrative and operational efficiency. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">On the other hand, during a recent review of the management fee breakdown among key operators, we decided to adjust the fee breakdown with effect from 1 July 2021. While the fee components among different stakeholders were re-jiggled, the total management fee level payable by members remains unchanged. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In addition, the statutory Annual Registration Fee has been effected from 1 October 2020 and we are liable for the payment of the fee starting from 1 July 2021. Please rest assured that the fee will be borne and shared among the key operators with no impact on you.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For further details of the above, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-to-scheme-participants-072021.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a>, <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/vcfund-first-supplement-06072021.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">First Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">First Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a> and <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/vcfund-faq-06072021.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">frequently asked questions</span><span class="visuallyhidden">frequently asked questions  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_56">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="30Jun2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Guaranteed Interest Rate for the new financial year (30 June 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_76" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Guaranteed Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Fund available under HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is 0.15% per annum in the financial year from 1 July 2021 to 30 June 2022. The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) ‘Guarantee features’ of the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure/202003.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the ‘Guarantee Conditions’.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_57">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="25Jun2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            The latest edition of the "HSBC Retirement Monitor" is published (25 June 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_77" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The latest edition of "HSBC Retirement Monitor* (June 2021) " is now available on HSBC MPF website. You can click <a href="/mpf/retirement-monitor/">here</a> to understand the estimated expenditure for living in Hong Kong after retirement.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">*The "HSBC Retirement Monitor" was commissioned by HSBC MPF with The Association of Superannuation Funds of Australia conducting the research and analysis.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_58">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="18Jun2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            New feature will be brought to the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘Scheme’) (18 June 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_78" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With effect from 21 June 2021, there will be an additional option available for scheme participants to withdraw their MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits on their 65th birthday or on early retirement on or after reaching age 60, so that, they can create a long-term and steady monthly income for better retirement planning.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">At eligible scheme participants’ decision, they can apply the monthly regular withdrawal by submitting a valid INPR ‘Claim Form for Payment of MPF Accrued Benefits (Benefits) on Grounds of Attaining the Retirement Age of 65 or Early Retirement [FORM MPF(S) – W(R)]’ together with the appropriate supporting documents to the Administrator of the Scheme one time to receive the monthly regular withdrawal amount from the selected MPF account(s) under the Scheme as specified on the INPR until the selected MPF account(s) is terminated or such regular withdrawal instruction is amended or cancelled. Scheme participants can opt-in the method of payment by deposit directly or cheque. The regular withdrawal instruction(s) can be amended or cancelled at any time at scheme participants’ decision by submitting a valid INRW ‘Change of Regular Withdrawal Instruction Form’.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The above mentioned forms will be available at HSBC MPF website at www.hsbc.com.hk/mpf or designated branches or scheme participants may request copies of them by contacting the HSBC MPF Member Hotline <a href="tel:+85231280128" class="no-link" role="presentation">+852 3128 0128</a>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To learn more about this new feature, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/regular-withdrawal-faq.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Frequently Asked Questions</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Frequently Asked Questions  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
</div></div>

    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_59">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="27Apr2021"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Good MPF Employers is now open for applications (27 April 2021)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_79" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Hong Kong economy has been hit hard by the COVID-19 pandemic in the past year. Despite the uncertain outlook, many employers are still providing extra retirement protection for their employees. The Good MPF Employer Award, organised by the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority (MPFA), now in its seventh year, recognises employers that are committed to enhancing the retirement benefits of their employees. Since the inception of the Award, over 2,200 companies and organisations have been commended. A record 1,671 employers were recognised last year despite the pandemic, showing that many employers in Hong Kong are willing to go the extra mile to support the retirement benefits of their employees.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The 2020-21 Good MPF Employer Award is open for applications and nominations from 1 April to 30 June. Two special awards have been introduced to commend and encourage companies / organisations that have made continuous efforts to enhance the retirement protection of their employees. Employers who fulfil the relevant criteria will be presented with one or both of the following special awards:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Good MPF Employer 5+ Years<br> Companies / organisations that received the Good MPF Employer Award for five consecutive years or more.</li> 
 <li>Best All-round MPF Employer<br> Companies / organisations that meet all of the following criteria:<br>     (1) Received the Good MPF Employer Award for seven consecutive years;<br>     (2) Offered more than one MPF scheme;<br>     (3) Offered MPF voluntary contributions for some or all of their employees;<br>     (4) Received the e-Contribution Award; and<br>     (5) Received the MPF Support Award. </li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To apply for this year’s Award which covers the period from 1 April 2020 to 31 March 2021, companies / organisations can fill in and submit an application online on the <a href="http://www.mpfa.org.hk/en/mpfa/corporate-events/good-mpf-employer-award" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Good MPF Employer Award website</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Good MPF Employer Award website  This link will open in a new window</span></a>, or submit their application by email, fax or post. Employees are also welcome to nominate their employers for the Award by submitting a nomination form to the MPFA.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The results of 2020-21 Good MPF Employer Award will be announced in October 2021. The MPFA will present award certificates to the awardees, and the list of awardees will be uploaded to the MPFA website. In addition to being invited to attend activities organised by the MPFA and receiving the latest information from the MPFA, the awardees will be entitled to display the award logo on their websites, and in their promotional materials, advertisements and activities until 30 September 2022. They also have the opportunity to share their experience with the public through various channels.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Act now, Good MPF Employers!</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The above information is provided by the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC MPF weekend roadshow in Tuen Mun Town Plaza Branch on 10-11 August 2024 is suspended until further notice. We are sorry for the inconvenience and will provide updates on the weekend roadshow schedule as the situation evolves.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Find out more about MPF and understand what are the considerations when choosing an MPF scheme, visit and meet our MPF Specialists at designated branches with MPF service during branch business hour or <a href="https://appointment.hsbc.com.hk/pensions/?config.bbLocaleSettings.defaultLanguage=en" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">making an appointment</span><span class="visuallyhidden">making an appointment  This link will open in a new window</span></a> to meet them with selected timeslot.</p>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_69" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="cdsb-hmpf"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Changes in the disclosures in the MPF Scheme Brochure of the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (22 July 2024)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_93" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With effect from 12 August 2024, the disclosures of certain Constituent Funds in the MPF Scheme Brochure of the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus will be updated with respect to the use of financial futures contracts by its respective underlying approved pooled investment funds (the ‘APIFs’). The changes will allow the Investment Manager of the underlying APIFs to have the flexibility to address any settlement mismatch and will not have any adverse impact to scheme participants.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For further details of the above changes, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-20240722.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a> and <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs//mpf/faq-202407.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">frequently asked questions</span><span class="visuallyhidden">frequently asked questions  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The First Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure of the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus will be issued on 12 August 2024 and be available on the HSBC MPF website in due course.</p>
</div></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            An interactive key scheme information document of HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘SuperTrust Plus’) has been launched (28 June 2024)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A key scheme information document (KSID) webpage offering an interactive experience has been launched to help scheme participants easily access key information about the SuperTrust Plus such as relevant fees and charges payable and the constituent funds available.<br> <br> Enjoy the new experience with a simple <a href="/mpf/key-scheme-information-document/" target="_self">click</a>. Scheme participants can now view the SuperTrust Plus’s updated fund information sorted by fund category, read the SuperTrust Plus scheme document to learn more about the scheme, download commonly used administration forms to manage their MPF accounts, and conveniently access and navigate the MPFA website.<br> <br> Learn how our award-winning products and services can help scheme participants save towards their retirement now.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Guaranteed Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Fund available under HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is 0.20% per annum in the financial year from 1 July 2024 to 30 June 2025. The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) ‘Guarantee features’ of the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the ‘Guarantee Conditions’.</p>

    <div class="anchor" id="supertrust-plus-3-june-2024"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Update of risk rating of Constituent Funds under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the “Scheme”) (3 June 2024)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_99" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We conduct reviews of the risk ratings for the Constituent Funds under the Scheme regularly in response to market conditions and our internal evaluations. Starting from 13 November 2023, we implemented a revised methodology that resulted in revisions to the risk ratings of certain Constituent Funds. On the other hand, the calculation methodology for risk class, which is another set of risk indicator concurrently being disclosed with the risk rating in the Fund Fact Sheet, remains unchanged.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To obtain the latest risk ratings of the Constituent Funds and the description of each of the risk rating category, please refer to the Monthly Fund Performance Summary and/or the Fund Fact Sheet posted on the HSBC MPF website or to the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Should you have any queries, please contact our HSBC MPF Member Hotline on <a href="tel:85231280128" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3128 0128</a>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that the risk ratings provided are for reference only and should not be regarded as investment advice. You should not solely rely on the risk ratings when making any investment choices for your MPF account(s).</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Entering its 10th anniversary this year, the Good MPF Employer Award is now open for applications and nominations. Employers who are exemplary in enhancing the retirement benefits of their employees should act now and receive the recognition you deserve!</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For details and online application, please visit <a href="https://www.mpfa.org.hk/en/mpfa/corporate-events/good-mpf-employer-award" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">The Good MPF Employer Award website</span><span class="visuallyhidden">The Good MPF Employer Award website  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The deadline is 15 July 2024.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The above information is provided by the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Ching Ming Festival and Easter holidays are around the corner. Employers are reminded to submit MPF Remittance Statements and make contributions in advance before the contribution deadline. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For employers who submit Remittance Statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure your mail items bear sufficient postage before posting and allow sufficient time for delivery to ensure the Remittance Statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline. Employers can also submit e-Remittance Statements and employer contributions via the HSBC HK Business Express mobile app​ (applicable to HSBC commercial banking customers only) or the HSBC Business Internet Banking anytime, anywhere. <a href="/mpf/understanding/managing/#employer" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Contribution arrangement for January 2024 (29 January 2024)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_105" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Lunar New Year holiday is around the corner. Employers are reminded to submit MPF Remittance Statements and make contributions in advance before the contribution deadline. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For employers who submit Remittance Statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure your mail items bear sufficient postage before posting and allow sufficient time for delivery to ensure the Remittance Statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline. Employers can also submit e-Remittance Statements and employer contributions via HSBC HK Business Express mobile app​ (applicable to HSBC commercial banking customers only) or HSBC Business Internet Banking anytime, anywhere. <a href="/mpf/understanding/managing/#employer" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_91">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="27march2023"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Contribution arrangement for March 2023 (27 March 2023)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_123" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Ching Ming Festival and Easter holiday are around the corner. Employers are reminded to submit MPF Remittance Statements and make contributions in advance before the contribution deadline. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For employers who submit Remittance Statements and/or cheques by mail, please ensure your mail items bear sufficient postage before posting and allow sufficient time for delivery to ensure the Remittance Statements and/or cheques will reach HSBC MPF on or before the contribution deadline. Employers can also submit e-Remittance Statements and employer contributions via HSBC HK Business Express mobile app (applicable to HSBC commercial banking customers only) or HSBC Business Internet Banking anytime, anywhere. <a href="/mpf/understanding/managing/#employer" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

            The latest edition of the "HSBC Retirement Monitor" is published (3 March 2023)

        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The latest edition of "HSBC Retirement Monitor* (March 2023) " is now available on HSBC MPF website. You can click <a href="/mpf/retirement-monitor/">here</a> to understand the estimated expenditure for living in Hong Kong after retirement.</p>

    <div class="anchor" id="27feb2023"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Update of risk rating for the Hong Kong and Chinese Equity Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the “Scheme”) (27 February 2023)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_125" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We conduct reviews of the risk ratings for the Constituent Funds under the Scheme regularly and the risk ratings may be subject to change from time to time. We would like to inform you that the latest risk rating review has been completed. <strong>With effect from 28 February 2023, the risk rating for the Hong Kong and Chinese Equity Fund under the Scheme will be increased from '4' to '5</strong>, while the risk ratings for other Constituent Funds under the Scheme remain unchanged.<br> <br> To obtain the latest risk ratings of the other Constituent Funds and the description of each of the risk rating category, please refer to the 'Monthly Fund Performance Summary' and/or the 'Fund Fact Sheet' posted on the HSBC MPF website or to the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Should you have any queries, please contact our HSBC MPF Member Hotline on <strong><a href="tel:+852-3128-0128" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3128 0128</a></strong>.<br> <br> Please note that the risk ratings provided are for reference only and should not be regarded as investment advice. You should not rely on the risk ratings when making any investment choices for your MPF account(s).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_96">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="16Nov2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Changes in relation to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘Scheme’) (16 November 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_130" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As announced earlier, from 13 September 2022, several changes in relation to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund (the ‘Constituent Fund’) of the Scheme have taken effect. The Constituent Fund’s underlying ITCIS (i.e. Hang Seng Index ETF) has been de-listed from the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited and continues to operate as an unlisted fund. Consequentially, the Hang Seng Index ETF has been renamed to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund. The management fee of the Constituent Fund has been updated from ‘up to 0.755%’ to ‘up to 0.73%’ pa of NAV. For further details, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-20221025.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a>, <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/supplement-20221116.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Supplement to the MPF Scheme Brochure  This link will open in a new window</span></a> and <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/ksid.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Key Scheme Information Document</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Key Scheme Information Document  This link will open in a new window</span></a> of the Scheme which have already available on HSBC MPF website.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_97">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="25Oct2022"></div>

    <h3 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Changes in relation to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund under the HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Plus (the ‘Scheme’) (25 October 2022)
    </h3>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_131" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Informed by Hang Seng Investment Management Limited, who is the Investment Manager for the underlying ITCIS (i.e. Hang Seng Index ETF) invested by the Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund of the Scheme (the ‘Constituent Fund’), that the Hang Seng Index ETF is de-listed from the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited on 13 September 2022 and continues to operate as an unlisted fund. Consequentially, Hang Seng Index ETF is renamed to Hang Seng Index Tracking Fund. Such changes do not result in any change in the underlying ITCIS’s investment objective as disclosed in the MPF Scheme Brochure (which is to track the Hang Seng Index), its key operators (including the Investment Manager) and the manner in which it is managed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In addition, the management fee of the Constituent Fund is updated from ‘up to 0.755%’ to ‘up to 0.73%’ pa of NAV with effective from 13 September 2022.  </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For further details of the above, please refer to the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/notice-20221025.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Scheme Participants</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Scheme Participants  This link will open in a new window</span></a>. The MPF Scheme Brochure as amended by the Supplement reflecting the above changes and the updated Key Scheme Information Document will be available on or after 13 September 2022 on HSBC MPF website.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>
